cards.name: Akroan Jailer
cards.text: {2}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
cards.flavor: He ensures escape attempts are just that—attempts.

cards.name: Ampryn Tactician
cards.text: When Ampryn Tactician enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "It's all a game. You shouldn't get too attached to the pieces."

cards.name: Anointer of Champions
cards.text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Arise. You have been anointed by the light. Go forth and fight without fear, for you shall be victorious."

cards.name: Archangel of Tithes
cards.text:
Flying
As long as Archangel of Tithes is untapped, creatures can't attack you or a planeswalker you control unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures.
As long as Archangel of Tithes is attacking, creatures can't block unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures.

cards.name: Auramancer
cards.text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

cards.name: Aven Battle Priest
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Battle Priest enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor: When the shadow of the aven falls across the battlefield, hope rises in the hearts of the soldiers.

cards.name: Blessed Spirits
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Blessed Spirits.
cards.flavor: Not all heroes die in armor.

cards.text: Target player sacrifices an attacking or blocking creature.
cards.name: Celestial Flare
cards.flavor: "You were defeated the moment you declared your aggression."—Gideon Jura

cards.name: Charging Griffin
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Charging Griffin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Four claws, two wings, one beak, no fear.

cards.name: Cleric of the Forward Order
cards.text: When Cleric of the Forward Order enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature you control named Cleric of the Forward Order.
cards.flavor: War after war, a healer's enemy is always the same—death itself.

cards.name: Consul's Lieutenant
cards.text:
First strike
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
Whenever Consul's Lieutenant attacks, if it's renowned, other attacking creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Enlightened Ascetic
cards.text: When Enlightened Ascetic enters the battlefield, you may destroy target enchantment.
cards.flavor: "I do not reject the gods. I reject their authority, their pettiness, and their arrogance."

cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn. If it's renowned, untap it.
cards.name: Enshrouding Mist
cards.flavor: True faith is letting the blade fall without parry. True cunning is using that moment to strike a deadly blow.

cards.text:
Put four 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance onto the battlefield.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
cards.name: Gideon's Phalanx

cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, tap target creature defending player controls."
cards.name: Grasp of the Hieromancer
cards.flavor: "There is power in abandon, but far more in control."—Warden Hixus, to Kytheon

cards.text:
Until end of turn, if a creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.
Draw a card.
cards.name: Hallowed Moonlight
cards.flavor: Creatures of darkness instinctively hide from the light.

cards.text:
Target player gains 4 life.
Draw a Sorcerycard.
cards.name: Healing Hands
cards.flavor: The ethereal touch brings relief. The physical touch brings peace.

cards.name: Heavy Infantry
cards.text: When Heavy Infantry enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls.
cards.flavor: Doors, walls, skulls . . . it matters not. All barriers will be broken.

cards.name: Hixus, Prison Warden
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, if Hixus, Prison Warden entered the battlefield this turn, exile that creature until Hixus leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

cards.name: Knight of the Pilgrim's Road
cards.text: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
cards.flavor: "To be a knight, Gideon, is to be the shield for the meek against the cruel."

cards.name: Knight of the White Orchid
cards.text:
First strike
When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

Enchant creature
When Knightly Valor enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance onto the battlefield. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.
cards.name: Knightly Valor
Kytheon, Hero of Akros
cards.text:
At end of combat, if Kytheon, Hero of Akros and at least two other creatures attacked this combat, exile Kytheon, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control.
{2}{W}: Kytheon gains indestructible until end of turn.

+2: Up to one target creature an opponent controls attacks Gideon, Battle-Forged during its controller's next turn if able.
+1: Until your next turn, target creature gains indestructible. Untap that creature.
0: Until end of turn, Gideon, Battle-Forged becomes a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.
cards.name: Gideon, Battle-Forged
Kytheon's Irregulars
cards.text:
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
{W}{W}: Tap target creature.
cards.flavor: Kytheon and his irregulars worked outside the law to bring justice to the streets of Akros.

cards.text:
Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, those creatures also gain vigilance until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)
cards.name: Kytheon's Tactics
cards.flavor: "Seal the gate. This is our fight now."

cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
cards.name: Mighty Leap
cards.flavor: "The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly."—Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

cards.text:
Enchant creature you control
When enchanted creature dies, put X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is its power.
cards.name: Murder Investigation
cards.flavor: "Every death has a web of consequences. Our job is to find the spider."

cards.name: Patron of the Valiant
cards.text:
Flying
When Patron of the Valiant enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor: "Bant's most gallant knights wear my sigil, and for that I am humbled."

cards.name: Relic Seeker
cards.text:
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
When Relic Seeker becomes renowned, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Sentinel of the Eternal Watch
cards.text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, tap target creature that player controls.
cards.flavor: The portcullis is superfluous.

cards.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
cards.name: Sigil of the Empty Throne
cards.flavor: When Asha left Bant, she ensured that the world would have protection and order in her absence.

cards.name: Stalwart Aven
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
As long as you control five or more enchantments, each other non-Aura enchantment you control is a creature in addition to its other types and has base power and base toughness each equal to its converted mana cost.
cards.name: Starfield of Nyx

cards.text:
Enchant nonland permanent
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
cards.name: Suppression Bonds
cards.flavor: "A master of hieromancy can see the advantage in any scenario."—Warden Hixus, to Kytheon

cards.text:
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you may cast Swift Reckoning as though it had flash. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
Destroy target tapped creature.
cards.name: Swift Reckoning
Topan Freeblade
cards.text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
cards.flavor: "My scars are my sigils. I will wear them with pride long after you're gone."

cards.name: Totem-Guide Hartebeest
cards.text: When Totem-Guide Hartebeest enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: It is hunted, but not for the kill. The magic within draws others to its presence.

cards.text: For each player, you choose from among the permanents that player controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker. Then each player sacrifices all other nonland permanents he or she controls.
cards.name: Tragic Arrogance
cards.flavor: The spear thrown by Kytheon's own hand was the weapon that felled his friends.

cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.name: Valor in Akros
cards.flavor: They became a single entity, a phalanx in the Temple of Triumph standing against a host of enemies.

cards.name: Vryn Wingmare
cards.text:
Flying
Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.
cards.flavor: It's the favored mount of military commanders as well as anyone with a flair for the dramatic.

cards.name: War Oracle
cards.text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
cards.flavor: "When you are felled by my mace, you shall know it was divine fate."

cards.name: Yoked Ox
cards.flavor: It was in fields of grain, not fields of battle, that the Champion learned to bear the yoke of duty to the gods. She worked the land long before she was called on to defend it.—The Theriad

cards.name: Alhammarret, High Arbiter
cards.text:
Flying
As Alhammarret, High Arbiter enters the battlefield, each opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose the name of a nonland card revealed this way.
Your opponents can't cast spells with the chosen name (as long as this creature is on the battlefield).
Put target creature on top of its owner's library. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
cards.name: Anchor to the Æther

cards.text: Draw two cards. If you control no artifacts, discard a card.
cards.name: Artificer's Epiphany
cards.flavor: The artificers of Kaladesh strive ceaselessly for perfection, progress, and the ultimate expression of elegance.

cards.name: Aspiring Aeronaut
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aspiring Aeronaut enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

Counter target creature spell.
Draw a card.
cards.name: Bone to Ash
cards.flavor: "I can think of worse ways to go. On second thought, maybe not."—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

cards.text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
cards.name: Calculated Dismissal

cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
cards.name: Clash of Wills
cards.flavor: Alhammarret rose to his feet, and the full force of his mind hit Jace like a storm front.

cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
cards.name: Claustrophobia
cards.flavor: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

cards.text: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library, then draws seven cards. If it's your turn, end the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities on the stack, including this card. Discard down to your maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)
cards.name: Day's Undoing
Deep-Sea Terror
cards.text: Deep-Sea Terror can't attack unless there are seven or more cards in your graveyard.
cards.flavor: After stripping the sunken ships, it rises to the surface for another helping.

cards.name: Disciple of the Ring
cards.text:
{1}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Choose one —
• Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
• Disciple of the Ring gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Tap target creature.
• Untap target creature.
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
cards.name: Disperse
cards.flavor: It's pointless to hold on when you have nothing to hold on with.

cards.text: Return all nonland permanents with converted mana cost X or less to their owners' hands.
cards.name: Displacement Wave
cards.flavor: The sea respects no boundaries, least of all the coast.

cards.text: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of lands you control.
cards.name: Dreadwaters
cards.flavor: Stray into the Morkrut and it may rise to claim you.

cards.name: Faerie Miscreant
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Faerie Miscreant enters the battlefield, if you control another creature named Faerie Miscreant, draw a card.
cards.flavor: One faerie distracts the judge while a second steals the law.

cards.name: Harbinger of the Tides
cards.text:
You may cast Harbinger of the Tides as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
When Harbinger of the Tides enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

Attacking creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
cards.name: Hydrolash
cards.flavor: "I don't need your mage-rings or your mana equations. I call, and the sea answers."—Keyta, rebel hydromancer
"People's thoughts just come to me. Sometimes I don't know if it's them or me thinking."
cards.name: Jace, Vryn's Prodigy
cards.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If there are five or more cards in your graveyard, exile Jace, Vryn's Prodigy, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control.

+1: Up to one target creature gets -2/-0 until your next turn.
−3: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard this turn. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.
−9: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, target opponent puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard."
cards.name: Jace, Telepath Unbound

cards.text:
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
cards.name: Jace's Sanctum
Jhessian Thief
cards.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Jhessian Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "Where's the fun in an escape if it's not at least a little daring?"

cards.name: Maritime Guard
cards.flavor: To stand as a guardian of the sea, one must possess the resolve of a mounting wave.

cards.name: Mizzium Meddler
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Mizzium Meddler enters the battlefield, you may change a target of target spell or ability to Mizzium Meddler.
cards.flavor: Energy surges in Izzet labs are opportunities for experimentation.

cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell.
cards.name: Negate
cards.flavor: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

cards.name: Nivix Barrier
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Nivix Barrier enters the battlefield, target attacking creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.

Counter target instant or sorcery spell that targets you.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you may copy the spell countered this way. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.name: Psychic Rebuttal
cards.flavor: "I know what you're thinking," Jace whispered in the mage's mind. "It's not going to work."

cards.name: Ringwarden Owl
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor: The owls learn of mana from the mages who know it best.

cards.name: Scrapskin Drake
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Scrapskin Drake can block only creatures with flying.
cards.flavor: "The cathars killed my skaabs down below. Let's see how high their swords can reach."—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

cards.name: Screeching Skaab
cards.text: When Screeching Skaab enters the battlefield, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.
cards.flavor: Its screeching is the sound of you losing your mind.

cards.text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
cards.name: Send to Sleep
Separatist Voidmage
cards.text: When Separatist Voidmage enters the battlefield, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: "As long as each side thinks it can win, the balance holds, and the mage-rings stand."—Alhammarret

cards.name: Sigiled Starfish
cards.text: {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
cards.flavor: Kruphix hid the most dire prophecies about humankind where humans would never find them and tritons wouldn't care to read them.

cards.name: Skaab Goliath
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Skaab Goliath, exile two creature cards from your graveyard.
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
cards.flavor: Three heads are better than one.

cards.name: Soulblade Djinn
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: He grants endless wishes, as long as you always wish for a blade.

cards.text:
Whenever you draw a card, target opponent puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If they're both nonland cards that share a color, repeat this process.
{5}{U}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.name: Sphinx's Tutelage
cards.flavor: "You've never considered the implications of dealing with another telepath, Jace."

cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Stratus Walk enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.
cards.name: Stratus Walk

cards.text:
Target opponent reveals the top seven cards of his or her library. You may cast an instant or sorcery card from among them without paying its mana cost. Then that player puts the rest into his or her graveyard.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you may cast up to two revealed instant and/or sorcery cards instead of one.
cards.name: Talent of the Telepath

cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an artifact, put a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.
cards.name: Thopter Spy Network
Tower Geist
cards.text:
Flying
When Tower Geist enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
cards.flavor: Jenrik's tower is served by those who once sought to enter it uninvited.

cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.
cards.name: Turn to Frog
cards.flavor: "Ribbit."

cards.name: Watercourser
cards.text: {U}: Watercourser gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Beware an eddy where there should be none or a stretch that flows too fast or too slow."—Old Fishbones, Martyne river guide

cards.name: Whirler Rogue
cards.text:
When Whirler Rogue enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.
Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

cards.name: Willbreaker
cards.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, gain control of that creature for as long as you control Willbreaker.
cards.flavor: "Master your mind, or I shall master it for you."

cards.name: Blightcaster
cards.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may have target creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Your flesh is unprepared for my gifts."

cards.name: Catacomb Slug
cards.flavor: "The entire murder scene was covered in dripping, oozing slime. No need for a soothsayer to solve that one."—Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and "Sacrifice two other creatures: Regenerate this creature." (The next time the creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
cards.name: Consecrated by Blood

cards.text: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.name: Cruel Revival
cards.flavor: On Innistrad, Liliana embraced necromancy, honing her powers by practicing on scores of undead—and sometimes the living.

cards.text:
Regenerate target creature. Draw a card. (The next time the creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, also regenerate each other creature you control.
cards.name: Dark Dabbling

cards.text:
Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
cards.name: Dark Petition
Deadbridge Shaman
cards.text: When Deadbridge Shaman dies, target opponent discards a card.
cards.flavor: Ending her life won't end the infestation.

cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one that hasn't been chosen —
• Demonic Pact deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.
• Target opponent discards two cards.
• Draw two cards.
• You lose the game.
cards.name: Demonic Pact
Despoiler of Souls
cards.text:
Despoiler of Souls can't block.
{B}{B}, Exile two other creature cards from your graveyard: Return Despoiler of Souls from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Rats and vultures devour. It desecrates.

cards.name: Erebos's Titan
cards.text:
As long as your opponents control no creatures, Erebos's Titan has indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
Whenever a creature card leaves an opponent's graveyard, you may discard a card. If you do, return Erebos's Titan from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Eyeblight Assassin
cards.text: When Eyeblight Assassin enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Boggart blood disgusts me almost as much as the foul creatures themselves."

cards.text: Non-Elf creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.name: Eyeblight Massacre
cards.flavor: "I've already seen so much evil, so much darkness. Why do you insist on adding more?"—Nissa Revane, to Dwynen

cards.name: Fetid Imp
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Fetid Imp gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.name: Fleshbag Marauder
cards.text: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

cards.name: Gilt-Leaf Winnower
cards.text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Gilt-Leaf Winnower enters the battlefield, you may destroy target non-Elf creature whose power and toughness aren't equal.

cards.name: Gnarlroot Trapper
cards.text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast an Elf creature spell.
{T}: Target attacking Elf you control gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.name: Graveblade Marauder
cards.text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Whenever Graveblade Marauder deals combat damage to a player, that player loses life equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "When this creature dies, draw a card."
cards.name: Infernal Scarring
cards.flavor: One who is marked by a demon in life is sure to be remembered as one in death.

cards.text: Name a creature card. Search target opponent's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
cards.name: Infinite Obliteration
Kothophed, Soul Hoarder
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a permanent owned by another player is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
cards.flavor: "I will be your most demanding master, Liliana. But I have great things in mind for you."

cards.text: All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn.
cards.name: Languish
cards.flavor: Life is such a fragile thing.

cards.name: Liliana, Heretical Healer
cards.text:
Lifelink
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile Liliana, Heretical Healer, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control. If you do, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

+2: Each player discards a card.
−X: Return target nonlegendary creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield.
−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step."
cards.name: Liliana, Defiant Necromancer

cards.text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.
cards.name: Macabre Waltz
cards.flavor: "All dead move to the hollow rhythm of necromancy."—Savra

cards.name: Malakir Cullblade
cards.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Malakir Cullblade.
cards.flavor: Each cut stains his blade with fresh blood that he samples to increase his strength.

cards.name: Nantuko Husk
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Nantuko Husk gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "The soul sheds light, and death is its shadow. When the light dims, life and death embrace."—Nantuko teaching

cards.text:
Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, that creature enters the battlefield with two additional +1/+1 counters on it.
cards.name: Necromantic Summons

cards.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player discards that card. If you don't, that player discards two cards.
cards.name: Nightsnare
cards.flavor: Ravnica would be safer if mere coin was all the Dimir could steal.

cards.name: Priest of the Blood Rite
cards.text:
When Priest of the Blood Rite enters the battlefield, put a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.
cards.flavor: Some will sacrifice everything for but a taste of power.

cards.name: Rabid Bloodsucker
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Rabid Bloodsucker enters the battlefield, each player loses 2 life.
cards.flavor: She haunts the streets, wings spread wide, with carrion on her breath and blood in her eyes.

cards.text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
cards.name: Read the Bones
cards.flavor: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

cards.text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
cards.name: Reave Soul
cards.flavor: "I was not convinced you had a soul until I saw it for myself."—Liliana Vess

cards.name: Returned Centaur
cards.text: When Returned Centaur enters the battlefield, target player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
cards.flavor: Driven away by his living kin, he wanders mourning through the wilderness, seeking the dead city of Asphodel.

cards.name: Revenant
cards.text:
Flying
Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
cards.flavor: Born from the slaughter of an entire army, it bears the wrath of a hundred souls.

cards.text:
Whenever a creature dies, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{4}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Activate this ability only if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard.
cards.name: Shadows of the Past
Shambling Ghoul
cards.text: Shambling Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor: Once he gets up and going, he will forever shamble on.

cards.text: If an opponent would gain life, that player loses that much life instead.
cards.name: Tainted Remedy
cards.flavor: "Drink this, brother. It will bring you rest."—Liliana Vess

cards.name: Thornbow Archer
cards.text: Whenever Thornbow Archer attacks, each opponent who doesn't control an Elf loses 1 life.
cards.flavor: "I will not rest until the stench of eyeblights is eradicated from these woods."

cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Tormented Thoughts, sacrifice a creature.
Target player discards a number of cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.
cards.name: Tormented Thoughts
cards.flavor: "Not all nightmares can be escaped by waking."—Ashiok

cards.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. Whenever a creature dealt damage by that creature dies this turn, its controller loses 2 life. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.name: Touch of Moonglove
Undead Servant
cards.text: When Undead Servant enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield for each card named Undead Servant in your graveyard.
cards.flavor: "Get up. You're not finished yet."—Liliana Vess

cards.text:
Destroy target creature.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you gain 2 life.
cards.name: Unholy Hunger
cards.flavor: Liliana viewed the attention of the angels as a testament to her power. Even so, they were an annoyance.

cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-2.
cards.name: Weight of the Underworld
cards.flavor: Proud Alkmenos, who would not bow to Erebos in death, is now bowed by his own hubris for all eternity.

cards.name: Abbot of Keral Keep
cards.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Abbot of Keral Keep enters the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

cards.name: Acolyte of the Inferno
cards.text:
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
Whenever Acolyte of the Inferno becomes blocked by a creature, it deals 2 damage to that creature.
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
cards.name: Act of Treason
cards.flavor: She learned a tragic lesson that day: even the purest can be corrupted when the heart's emotions are twisted.

cards.name: Akroan Sergeant
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

cards.name: Avaricious Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.
At the beginning of your end step, discard your hand.
cards.flavor: Waste follows want.

cards.name: Bellows Lizard
cards.text: {1}{R}: Bellows Lizard gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: As the price of wood and coal rose, smiths found creative ways to keep their forges burning.

cards.name: Boggart Brute
cards.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
cards.flavor: He has the biggest bashing stick, so it's a safe bet he's the leader.

cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+2 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, sacrifice Call of the Full Moon.
cards.name: Call of the Full Moon
Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a red spell, untap Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh.
{T}: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh deals 1 damage to target player. If Chandra has dealt 3 or more damage this turn, exile her, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.

+1: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target player.
−2: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target creature.
−7: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 6 damage to each opponent. Each player dealt damage this way gets an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 3 damage to you."
cards.name: Chandra, Roaring Flame

cards.text: Chandra's Fury deals 4 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.
cards.name: Chandra's Fury
cards.flavor: "They started it."

cards.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each other creature and each opponent.
cards.name: Chandra's Ignition
cards.flavor: In the moment before her execution, she realized what it meant to be a pyromancer, to be alive, to be Chandra.

cards.name: Cobblebrute
cards.flavor: Ravnica's most ancient streets take on a life of their own. A few have decided to move to nicer neighborhoods.

cards.text: Destroy target artifact or land.
cards.name: Demolish
cards.flavor: Nothing of nature nor of mortals can stand forever.

cards.text: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.name: Dragon Fodder
cards.flavor: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

cards.name: Embermaw Hellion
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
If another red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that permanent or player instead.

cards.name: Enthralling Victor
cards.text: When Enthralling Victor enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power 2 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
cards.flavor: If you stare at the sun for too long, you'll lose your ability to see clearly.

cards.text:
Exquisite Firecraft deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Exquisite Firecraft can't be countered by spells or abilities.
cards.name: Exquisite Firecraft
cards.flavor: Chandra's gift set her apart and others aflame.

cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Fiery Conclusion, sacrifice a creature.
Fiery Conclusion deals 5 damage to target creature.
cards.name: Fiery Conclusion
cards.flavor: The Boros legionnaire saw a noble sacrifice, the Rakdos thug a blazing suicide, and the Izzet alchemist an experiment gone awry.

cards.text:
Fiery Impulse deals 2 damage to target creature.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Fiery Impulse deals 3 damage to that creature instead.
cards.name: Fiery Impulse
cards.flavor: "Well, this got out of hand."

cards.name: Firefiend Elemental
cards.text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {R}. If you do, put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of that creature. That token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.name: Flameshadow Conjuring

cards.text: Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Ghirapur Æther Grid deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.name: Ghirapur Æther Grid
cards.flavor: The city of Ghirapur is a living thing, and living things defend themselves.

cards.name: Ghirapur Gearcrafter
cards.text: When Ghirapur Gearcrafter enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield. (A creature with flying can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
cards.flavor: The metal must be pure. The hand must be steady. The product must be perfect.

cards.name: Goblin Glory Chaser
cards.text:
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
As long as Goblin Glory Chaser is renowned, it has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

cards.name: Goblin Piledriver
cards.text:
Protection from blue (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything blue.)
Whenever Goblin Piledriver attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1, has haste, and attacks each turn if able.
When enchanted creature dies, you may search your library for a card named Infectious Bloodlust, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
cards.name: Infectious Bloodlust

cards.text: Lightning Javelin deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
cards.name: Lightning Javelin
cards.flavor: The harpies descended without mercy upon Akros, only to find their attack put them within range of the javelineers.

cards.name: Mage-Ring Bully
cards.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Mage-Ring Bully attacks each turn if able.
cards.flavor: "Don't be rude, Beleren. We just want to enjoy the view with you."

cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Magmatic Insight, discard a land card.
Draw two cards.
cards.name: Magmatic Insight
cards.flavor: Chief among the tenets of Purphoros is that one must destroy in order to create.

cards.text: {R}, Discard a land card: Molten Vortex deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
cards.name: Molten Vortex
cards.flavor: If you can't take the heat . . . well, that's going to be a problem.

cards.name: Pia and Kiran Nalaar
cards.text:
When Pia and Kiran Nalaar enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.
{2}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Pia and Kiran Nalaar deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Prickleboar
cards.text: As long as it's your turn, Prickleboar gets +2/+0 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
cards.flavor: "Canyons in the Phoberos badlands are essentially gates to the Underworld."—Mirinthes, Akroan captain

cards.text:
Ravaging Blaze deals X damage to target creature. 
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Ravaging Blaze also deals X damage to that creature's controller.
cards.name: Ravaging Blaze
cards.flavor: In time, not even the fire monks could keep up with Chandra.

cards.name: Scab-Clan Berserker
cards.text:
Haste
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, if Scab-Clan Berserker is renowned, Scab-Clan Berserker deals 2 damage to that player.

cards.name: Seismic Elemental
cards.text: When Seismic Elemental enters the battlefield, creatures without flying can't block this turn.
cards.flavor: "Trying to stop it would be foolish. If you feel it coming—run!"—Sergeant Ryda

cards.name: Skyraker Giant
cards.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor: She will not be content until hers is the highest head in the sky.

cards.text: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.
cards.name: Smash to Smithereens
cards.flavor: The giant Tarvik dreamed that trinkets and machines caused all the world's woe. When he awoke from his troubled sleep, he took the name Tarvik Relicsmasher.

cards.name: Subterranean Scout
cards.text: When Subterranean Scout enters the battlefield, target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
cards.flavor: When things get ugly above ground, goblins resort to alternate routes of passage.

cards.name: Thopter Engineer
cards.text:
When Thopter Engineer enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
Artifact creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)
Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
cards.name: Titan's Strength
Volcanic Rambler
cards.text: {2}{R}: Volcanic Rambler deals 1 damage to target player.
cards.flavor: It moves through lava with the force of an erupting volcano.

cards.text: Aerial Volley deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures with flying.
cards.name: Aerial Volley
cards.flavor: Drakes can swerve to avoid a single arrow, but they can't dodge the whole sky.

cards.text:
Reveal the top X cards of your library. Put all land cards from among them onto the battlefield tapped and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, untap those lands.
cards.name: Animist's Awakening
Caustic Caterpillar
cards.text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Caustic Caterpillar: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: "The rare and beautiful butterflies inspire the design of our thopters. The larvae, however, are a different story entirely."—Kiran Nalaar, Ghirapur inventor

cards.name: Conclave Naturalists
cards.text: When Conclave Naturalists enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: "Your swords and wards have no power here."

cards.name: Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen
cards.text:
Reach
Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking Elf you control.
cards.flavor: "This is our land. We will not allow eyeblights to poison its beauty."

cards.name: Dwynen's Elite
cards.text: When Dwynen's Elite enters the battlefield, if you control another Elf, put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "Come, my beautiful brothers and sisters. Let us hunt."—Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf daen

cards.text: Whenever a creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
cards.name: Elemental Bond
cards.flavor: "I want to help Zendikar. Show me the way."—Nissa Revane

cards.name: Elvish Visionary
cards.text: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."

cards.text: {G}, Sacrifice a creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
cards.name: Evolutionary Leap
cards.flavor: The essence of nature is change.

cards.name: Gaea's Revenge
cards.text:
Gaea's Revenge can't be countered.
Haste
Gaea's Revenge can't be the target of nongreen spells or abilities from nongreen sources.

Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, put up to two creature cards from among the revealed cards into your hand instead of one.
cards.name: Gather the Pack

cards.text: Each player shuffles all cards from his or her hand and all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then draws that many cards. Each player may put any number of land cards from his or her hand onto the battlefield. Exile The Great Aurora.
cards.name: The Great Aurora
Herald of the Pantheon
cards.text:
Enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: The distinction of bearing the gods' banner is nothing compared to the glory of being closer to Nyx.

cards.name: Hitchclaw Recluse
cards.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor: Not all spiders need webs to catch their prey.

cards.name: Honored Hierarch
cards.text:
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
As long as Honored Hierarch is renowned, it has vigilance and "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
Each creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.
cards.name: Joraga Invocation
cards.flavor: "A single tree does not a forest make. We are stronger when we stand together."—Numa, Joraga chieftain

cards.name: Leaf Gilder
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana, ordered hundreds of trees uprooted and rearranged into a pattern he deemed beautiful. Thus the Gilt-Leaf Wood was born.

cards.name: Llanowar Empath
cards.text: When Llanowar Empath enters the battlefield, scry 2, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into your hand. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Managorger Hydra
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
Whenever a player casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Managorger Hydra.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
cards.name: Mantle of Webs
cards.flavor: "Why does everything the Golgari touch end up sticky?"—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.
cards.name: Might of the Masses
cards.flavor: The Joraga elves never need ask a troll to leave their territory. They merely grant it their combined strength, and it can't resist embarking on a merry rampage.

cards.name: Nissa, Vastwood Seer
cards.text:
When Nissa, Vastwood Seer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands, exile Nissa, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.

+1: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.
−2: Put a legendary 4/4 green Elemental creature token named Ashaya, the Awoken World onto the battlefield.
−7: Untap up to six target lands. They become 6/6 Elemental creatures. They're still lands.
cards.name: Nissa, Sage Animist

cards.text:
Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, search your library for up to three basic Forest cards instead of two.
cards.name: Nissa's Pilgrimage

cards.text: Scry 5, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you draw cards equal to its power and you gain life equal to its toughness.
cards.name: Nissa's Revelation
cards.flavor: The evil inside the mountain pulsed at Nissa in a shock wave of madness.

cards.name: Orchard Spirit
cards.text: Orchard Spirit can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.
cards.flavor: "Pick not the rotten fruit, but neither touch the best. Leave those as an offering for our unseen guests."—Radwick, farmer of Gatstaf

cards.name: Outland Colossus
cards.text:
Renown 6 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put six +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)
Outland Colossus can't be blocked by more than one creature.

cards.name: Pharika's Disciple
cards.text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
cards.name: Reclaim
cards.flavor: The wise pay as much attention to what they throw away as to what they keep.

cards.name: Rhox Maulers
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
Renown 2 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)

cards.name: Skysnare Spider
cards.text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor: The only thing more ill-tempered than a griffin in a web is the spider that must subdue it.

cards.name: Somberwald Alpha
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{1}{G}: Target creature you control gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)

cards.name: Sylvan Messenger
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Timberpack Wolf
cards.text: Timberpack Wolf gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control named Timberpack Wolf.
cards.flavor: Their strength is no mere numbers game. An intangible force augments the wolves when they run together.

cards.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
cards.name: Titanic Growth
cards.flavor: The massive dominate through might. The tiny survive with guile. Beware the tiny who become massive.

cards.name: Undercity Troll
cards.text:
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
{2}{G}: Regenerate Undercity Troll. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

cards.name: Valeron Wardens
cards.text:
Renown 2 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)
Whenever a creature you control becomes renowned, draw a card.

cards.name: Vastwood Gorger
cards.flavor: "A long and difficult incision revealed that all vital organs are housed in the head, save for a long chain of stomachs, forty in all, leading from its throat to the end of the tail."—Mulak Ffar, Vastwood Biodiversity

cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with power 4 or less.
cards.name: Vine Snare
cards.flavor: Nissa found that the vines of the marsh could ensnare just as well as forest vines could—maybe even better.

cards.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
cards.name: Wild Instincts
cards.flavor: Nissa had only the space of a heartbeat to react, her instincts steering her blade.

cards.name: Woodland Bellower
cards.text: When Woodland Bellower enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a nonlegendary green creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Yeva's Forcemage
cards.text: When Yeva's Forcemage enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Nature can't be stopped. It rips and tears at Ravnica's tallest buildings to claim its place in the sun."

cards.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a 2/2 green Elemental creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.name: Zendikar's Roil
cards.flavor: "I was wrong. Zendikar isn't after me. It isn't after any of us. It's not evil or vengeful. It's magnificent . . . but it's in pain."—Nissa Revane

cards.name: Blazing Hellhound
cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Blazing Hellhound deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: It tears the flesh from your bones and then swallows the ash with its fiery maw.

cards.name: Blood-Cursed Knight
cards.text: As long as you control an enchantment, Blood-Cursed Knight gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor: "The bloodlust shall not control me, for my oath is my greatest compulsion."

cards.name: Bounding Krasis
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Bounding Krasis enters the battlefield, you may tap or untap target creature.
cards.flavor: Unpredictable as a storm and destructive as a tidal wave.

cards.name: Citadel Castellan
cards.text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Renown 2 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)
cards.flavor: "I am the first line of defense. You will not encounter the second."

cards.name: Iroas's Champion
cards.text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
cards.flavor: Accustomed to battling before an audience in the arena, Iroas's champions know how to put on a good show.

cards.name: Possessed Skaab
cards.text:
When Possessed Skaab enters the battlefield, return target instant, sorcery, or creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
If Possessed Skaab would die, exile it instead.
cards.flavor: A stitcher's attempt at a skaab with a soul.

cards.name: Reclusive Artificer
cards.text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
When Reclusive Artificer enters the battlefield, you may have it deal damage to target creature equal to the number of artifacts you control.

cards.name: Shaman of the Pack
cards.text: When Shaman of the Pack enters the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to the number of Elves you control.
cards.flavor: To the elves, her spear is a compass; to the boggarts, a harbinger of doom.

cards.name: Thunderclap Wyvern
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Thunder doesn't always mean rain. Sometimes it means ruin.

cards.name: Zendikar Incarnate
cards.text: Zendikar Incarnate's power is equal to the number of lands you control.
cards.flavor: "Her people angered Zendikar, and they faced the land's wrath. That is why Nissa is the last of the animists."—Numa, Joraga chieftain

cards.text:
When Alchemist's Vial enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Alchemist's Vial: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
cards.name: Alchemist's Vial
cards.flavor: A weapon best suited for those with good aim and steady hands.

cards.text:
If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead.
If you would draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, draw two cards instead.
cards.name: Alhammarret's Archive
cards.flavor: It contains the totality of Alhammarret's notes, theories, and ponderings.

cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Angel's Tomb become a 3/3 white Angel artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
cards.name: Angel's Tomb
cards.flavor: "Faith can quicken the stones themselves with life."—Writings of Mikaeus

cards.name: Bonded Construct
cards.text: Bonded Construct can't attack alone.
cards.flavor: Loyal to a fault, it heeds its master's every command.

cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
cards.name: Brawler's Plate
Chief of the Foundry
cards.text: Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: The foundries of Kaladesh run like clockwork under the supervision of their formidable overseers.

cards.name: Gold-Forged Sentinel
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: Blessed by the gods. Coveted by mortals. Beholden to neither.

cards.name: Guardian Automaton
cards.text: When Guardian Automaton dies, you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor: The wealthy in the city of Ghirapur outfit their lives with grand machines, entrusting even their children to filigree and gears.

cards.name: Guardians of Meletis
cards.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
cards.flavor: The histories speak of two feuding rulers whose deaths were celebrated and whose monuments symbolized the end of their wars. In truth they were peaceful lovers, their story lost to the ages.

cards.name: Hangarback Walker
cards.text:
Hangarback Walker enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
When Hangarback Walker dies, put a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield for each +1/+1 counter on Hangarback Walker.
{1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Hangarback Walker.

Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
cards.name: Helm of the Gods
cards.flavor: Its blessings are as numerous as the stars of Nyx.

cards.text: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.
cards.name: Jayemdae Tome
cards.flavor: A true scribe devotes an entire lifetime to the creation of a single volume, a masterpiece as unique as its maker.

cards.name: Mage-Ring Responder
cards.text:
Mage-Ring Responder doesn't untap during your untap step.
{7}: Untap Mage-Ring Responder.
Whenever Mage-Ring Responder attacks, it deals 7 damage to target creature defending player controls.

When Meteorite enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.name: Meteorite
cards.flavor: "And if I'm lying," he began . . .

cards.text:
You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
If a creature would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.
cards.name: Orbs of Warding
cards.flavor: One orb to guard the body, one to protect the mind, and one to shield the soul.

cards.text:
As Prism Ring enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen color, you gain 1 life.
cards.name: Prism Ring
cards.flavor: Wear it on your dominant hand and it will follow your lead.

cards.text: {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. When that mana is spent to cast a red instant or sorcery spell, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.name: Pyromancer's Goggles
cards.flavor: "I hope to meet Jaya Ballard someday. I think we'd get along."—Chandra Nalaar

cards.name: Ramroller
cards.text:
Ramroller attacks each turn if able.
Ramroller gets +2/+0 as long as you control another artifact.
cards.flavor: As unstoppable as it is unsteerable.

cards.name: Runed Servitor
cards.text: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.
cards.flavor: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

cards.text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other creature you control.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
cards.name: Sigil of Valor
cards.flavor: With each honor he earns, Gideon paves the path to his redemption.

cards.name: Sword of the Animist
cards.flavor: The blade glows only for Zendikar's chosen.

cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, you may sacrifice Throwing Knife. If you do, Throwing Knife deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
cards.name: Throwing Knife

cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
cards.name: Veteran's Sidearm
cards.flavor: "I've broken three swords, eighteen lances, and countless shields, but this little blade has survived every battle, just like I have."

cards.text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.
cards.name: War Horn
cards.flavor: The reverberations course through the warriors' veins, beat with their hearts, and pound with their footfalls as they charge into battle.

cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.
cards.name: Battlefield Forge

cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.
cards.name: Caves of Koilos

cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.name: Evolving Wilds
cards.flavor: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Foundry of the Consuls: Put two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.
cards.name: Foundry of the Consuls
cards.flavor: All around the foundry, automatons unhitched themselves from their mounts and pivoted to face Chandra.

cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool. Llanowar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.
cards.name: Llanowar Wastes

cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Mage-Ring Network.
{T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Mage-Ring Network: Add {C} to your mana pool for each storage counter removed this way.
cards.name: Mage-Ring Network

cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
cards.name: Rogue's Passage
cards.flavor: Rumors quickly spread among thieves about a labyrinth without walls and a prize beyond all measures of worth.

cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.
cards.name: Shivan Reef

cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.
cards.name: Yavimaya Coast
Aegis Angel
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aegis Angel enters the battlefield, another target permanent gains indestructible for as long as you control Aegis Angel. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)
Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
cards.name: Divine Verdict
cards.flavor: "Guilty."

cards.name: Eagle of the Watch
cards.text: Flying, vigilance
cards.flavor:
"Even from miles away, I could see our eagles circling. That's when I knew we were needed at home."
—Kanlos, Akroan captain

cards.name: Serra Angel
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
cards.flavor: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.

cards.text: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
cards.name: Into the Void
cards.flavor:
"The cathars have their swords, the inquisitors their axes. I prefer the ‘diplomatic' approach."
—Terhold, archmage of Drunau

cards.name: Mahamoti Djinn
cards.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
cards.flavor: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

cards.text: Draw two cards.
cards.name: Weave Fate
cards.flavor: Destiny is a flickering path among tangled possibilities.

cards.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.name: Flesh to Dust
cards.flavor:
"Another day. Another avenging angel. Another clump of feathers to toss in the trash."
—Liliana Vess

cards.text: Target player discards two cards.
cards.name: Mind Rot
cards.flavor:
"It saddens me to lose a source of inspiration. This one seemed especially promising."
—Ashiok

cards.name: Nightmare
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
cards.flavor: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.

cards.name: Sengir Vampire
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.
cards.flavor: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

cards.name: Fiery Hellhound
cards.text: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"I had hoped to instill in it the loyalty of a guard dog, but with fire's power comes its unpredictability."
—Maggath, Sardian elementalist

cards.name: Shivan Dragon
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

cards.text: Destroy target creature with flying.
cards.name: Plummet
cards.flavor:
"Let nothing own the skies but the wind."
—Dejara, Giltwood druid

cards.name: Prized Unicorn
cards.text: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.
cards.flavor:
"The desire for its magic horn inspires such bloodthirsty greed that all who see the unicorn will kill to possess it."
—Dionus, elvish archdruid

cards.name: Terra Stomper
cards.text:
Terra Stomper can't be countered.
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
cards.flavor: Sometimes violent earthquakes, hurtling boulders, and unseasonable dust storms are wrongly attributed to the Roil.
